title: A Very Devilish Christmas
description: Celebrate Christmas with Bone, Molly and the rest of the Red Devils in this special Christmas novella. Want to know how the devils throw a Christmas party. Well join them in this fun and exciting celebration that brings old friends together and lovers closer. With the holidays looming and war with the Jackal’s looking more and more likely family has never been more important than it is right now for the devils. Bone and Molly are trying not to think about their baby troubles, but with happy families surrounding them it’s harder than ever not to feel left out. Charity and Tick are celebrating their first Christmas together. Max is up to no good in the pageant the children are working on which is driving them crazy. Trick wants this Christmas to be special for Katie, so he’s come up with the perfect gift for his new bride.Racheal’s worried about Molly who seems to be sad even though she should be happy with the holidays being so close. She feels guilty that her own journey into impending motherhood has been easy while her best friend is struggling with her journey. Annie is about to kill her mother who keeps showing up at the wrong time ruining her alone time with Tank, who’s getting frustrated with the lack of privacy. While Molly and Bone discover the joy that can be found in a family that sticks together even when times are rough. No club business in this Novella...only hot bikers and their women celebrating the season.
author: Michelle  Woods
